title: Spacious Studio Apartment Available This Month!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'It’s your apartment and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.', 'Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals (when permissible), or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!', 'The MARQ on Martin offers remarkable studio, one- and two- bedroom apartment homes full of fresh and inspired design.', 'The brand new apartment homes at The MARQ on Martin, located in the heart of Lacey, Washington, are in the middle of everything the area has to offer.', "Whether you prefer the majestic beauty of Puget Sound's natural resources or an easy walk to a plethora of shopping & dining experiences, you're sure to find something that appeals to everyone in your home.", 'If staying around home is more your style, The MARQ includes an impressive list of custom amenities such as stainless steel appliances, 24-hour fitness center, in-home washer & dryers, swimming pool and spacious walk-in closets!', 'Contact a leasing professional today and let us introduce you to your new home at The MARQ on Martin.', 'SPRCL91', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 13, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'The Marq on Martin Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household with no weight limit.', '$25/pet monthly pet rent.', '$250 refundable deposit, $250 non-refundable fee for first pet, additional $250 refundable deposit for second pet.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Deposit:', '$200 Refundable $200 Non Refundable', 'Leasing options:', 'Month to month None,3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', '*Prices vary based on availability and lease terms.**Month to month is available after lease agreement is fulfilled.', 'Application fee:', '$20 Per Adult', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Garage, Covered, Off-Street', 'Parking notes:', 'Garages:
